TopicTitle: How close can you get to kerbol?

Articles.Content: Just wondering, since I'm sending a probe to get as close as possible to it (totally not messing around with a rover+sky crane using hyper edit (o.O) (O.o))

Tried that out aswell, you can get to surface level without exploding. Though you explode as soon ad you touch the ground.

Thermomethers gave me 14 degrees at 500 m away from kerbol's surface.... colder than kerbin.

My rover just proofed at 1000 - 999 meters...

Edit: wait, overheating? At 14 degrees!?!?!? T_T *ragequit*
Welcome to kerbal space program, you can hang your infi-glide plane over there.
